name: Cursed Planet
description:
You've heard the Shipper's Tales week after week, some "Cursed Planet" that has "Too Much Gravity". You think it's bogus, so you went to investigate, only to crash land on the planet.

Your engines can barely keep you off the ground, and can only power short bursts into the air. Use your ship's failing power to discover the source of the gravity and escape from the Cursed Planet!

OBJECTIVE- Destroy the Gravity Generator Satellite to escape the planet!

GATE UNLOCKS- Unlock additional powers by finding and passing through colored Gates!

  • Red Unlocks your Rock Thrower!
  • Green Unlocks increased hover capabilities! 3 seconds instead of 2!
  • Yellow Unlocks a powerful Dash Boost! 

CONTROLS -

  • WASD to move
  • Space to Hover
  • Shift to Boost (when unlocked)
  • Left Click to throw Rocks (when unlocked)
